EmailTemplate.name: Inquiry Auto Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for your Inquiry to NIST
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!NullValue(Case.SuppliedName, "Sir/Madam")},
Thank you for your inquiry to NIST. Your inquiry # {!Case.CaseNumber} has been sent to {!Case.Responding_Office__c} staff member.
Someone will get back to you as soon as possible.
Please do not reply to this email. This mailbox is not monitored.
Sincerely,
NIST Inquiry Management
